content: when sewing the pieces together earlier single_crochet in the first loop then chain 5 *single_crochet in the next stitch and chain 5* repeat from * to * in each loop all the way around at the end slip_stitch to the first stitch and bind off page 7 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com now you re all done good job page 8 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
